MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DD6 postcode area of Newport On Tay. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:45pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network located on the corner of Cupar Road and Blyth Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:28pm on Saturday, 30 January 2021
